resources.string: USB, Wi-Fi, or BT tethering on
An available Wi-Fi network has been detected. Connect to use Wi-Fi sharing instead of mobile data for your Mobile Hotspot.
You can choose apps that will continue on the cover screen when you close your phone.

"This app can't be resized while running, so it appears the same size as the cover screen. To make it fill the full screen, restart the app by tapping the button in the bottom right corner of the screen."
%s was closed automatically because it was causing your phone to overheat. You can open it again later after your phone cools down.
%s was closed automatically because it was causing your tablet to overheat. You can open it again later after your tablet cools down.
"You've used all your time for %s today. You can change this in Settings."
%s is blocked during Concentration mode. Contact your IT admin to learn more.
%s is being updated. Try again later.
"Can't use Bixby while Reserve battery for calls is on."
"Can't use Voice Assistant while setting up your phone with Bixby."
This app has been blocked by device administrator.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth.
Security policy restricts use of Bluetooth connection to hands-free features only.
"Can't install app. App not optimized for use with %s."
"Can't open Circle to Search on the Lock screen."
%1$s will be used by default whenever you perform this action. You can change your default app in %2$s Settings > Apps > More options button > Default apps.
Mobile data is paused until the end of your billing cycle.
%s has used more data than usual.
Your apps have used more data than usual.
Amfani da bayanan wayar hannu da yawa
"You've used %s of Mobile Hotspot and Tethering data."
If your Hotspot disconnects or slows down, check whether your service provider limits tethering data.
Dokar tsaro ta taƙaita amfani da raba Intanet
Change your screen lock type. This is required by the security policy.
The security policy restricts the use of unsecured tethering for hotspot.
Sauke katin SD kafin cirewa dan gudun batan bayanai
Tap here to transfer media files.
This device doesn’t support this %s. Tap to set up in a supported format.
"This app can't be resized while running. Restart the app to open it here or open your phone to use it on the main screen without restarting."
You are using this application outside of %s.
You are using this application outside of Knox mode.
Your phone will install updates automatically. Tap to learn more.
A Galaxy system app has been updated. To install the update, your phone needs to restart.
A Galaxy system app has been updated. To install the update, your tablet needs to restart.
Your tablet will install updates automatically. Tap to learn more.
Cannot use earphones while S bike mode enabled.
"Can't restart phone while SIM card is locked."
No app assigned to this key
Installation of unknown applications is not allowed by device administrator.
A software problem was detected during startup. If this problem keeps happening, contact Customer Support.

"A software problem was detected during startup. Check for a system software update, which may resolve this issue. If there's no software update and this problem keeps happening, contact Customer Support."
Security policy prevents the use of Mobile Hotspot.
An kasa amfani da wannan wayar ba tare da izini ba.
An kasa amfani da wannan tabulet ba tare da izini ba.
Your phone is locked because %1$s was uninstalled without authorization. Contact %2$s for more information.
Your phone is locked because %s was uninstalled without authorization.
Your tablet is locked because %1$s was uninstalled without authorization. Contact %2$s for more information.
Your tablet is locked because %s was uninstalled without authorization.
Too many files have been created on your phone. Apps may stop working correctly and your phone may no longer start up. Back up any important data and factory reset your phone.
%s was closed because it was causing your phone to overheat. You can open it again later after your phone cools down.
%s was closed because it was causing your tablet to overheat. You can open it again later after your tablet cools down.
Everything will go back to the way it was when Maintenance mode was first turned on.
"Maintenance mode can't be used while %s is active."
Ba za a iya amfani da yanayin Kulawa ba yayin da aka Adana wutar lantarki tare da ƙayyadaddun manhajoji da Allon gida.
"Maintenance mode isn't supported on this phone."
"Maintenance mode isn't supported on this tablet."
"%s za a iya amfani da shi da mai na'ura ne kawai."

%s service not supported. Contact customer services.

The audio device you selected for this app is the same as the current audio output device for your phone. To separate the sound for this app, change your audio output device in the quick settings panel.

The audio device you selected for this app is the same as the current audio output device for your phone. To separate the sound for this app, change your audio output device in the quick settings panel.
The audio device you selected for %1$s (%2$s) is the same as your main audio device. Change your main audio device to %3$s to separate sound for this app.
The audio device you selected to separate sound for certain apps (%1$s) is the same as your main audio device. Change your main audio device to %2$s to separate sound for these apps.
%s sound is playing on a Bluetooth audio device. Tap here to turn this off.
Sound is playing on your Bluetooth audio device. Tap here to turn this off
%s sound is playing through your headphones. Tap here to turn this off.
Sound is playing through your headphones. Tap here to turn this off.
%s sound is playing through your phone speaker. Tap here to turn this off.
Sound is playing through your phone speaker. Tap here to turn this off.
%s sound is playing through your USB audio device. Tap here to turn this off.
Sound is playing through your USB audio device. Tap here to turn this off.
This storage is read-only because it uses the NTFS format.
%s is running in Dark mode to save battery. You can switch to Light mode in Settings Labs.
Prevent the use of the internet.
Prevent the use of all cameras.
Prevent the use of desktop sync.
Prevent the use of Mobile Hotspot.
Prevent the use of POP and IMAP email on the phone.
Prevent the use of SD cards.
Prevent the use of text and multimedia messaging.

This application can prevent native applications from running.
Ƙyale mabuɗi da ake buƙata don buɗe naúra da za a dawo da ita
Yana buƙaci a rufe aikace-aikace na kan katin SD
This application can prevent applications from unknown sources from running.
This application can prevent applications from unknown sources from being installed.
Hana POP da imel na IMAP
Security policy prevents use of SD cards.
Unlock your Secure Folder to get notifications from apps in Secure Folder.
Unlock %s to get notifications about work apps.
Unlock your work profile to get notifications about work apps.
"You won't get all the notifications from work apps while %1$s is locked. Tap here to unlock %2$s."
"You won't get all the notifications from work apps while your work profile is locked. Tap here to unlock your work profile."
"Can't use mic in %1$s while it's being used in %2$s."

"There's a problem that's preventing your phone from starting up normally. You'll need to factory reset your phone to exit Safe mode. You can use Safe mode to back up your data to a computer or SD card before resetting your phone."

"There's a problem that's preventing your tablet from starting up normally. You'll need to factory reset your tablet to exit Safe mode. You can use Safe mode to back up your data to a computer or SD card before resetting your tablet."
Unable to open %s while Reserve battery mode enabled.
"%s isn't allowed to use mobile data. You can change this in Settings."
%1$s unable to use WLAN. Unblock %2$s and try again.
Based on the admin policy set for your phone, the following agreement has been withdrawn:
Based on the admin policy set for your tablet, the following agreement has been withdrawn:
Based on the admin policy set for your phone, the following agreements have been withdrawn:
Based on the admin policy set for your tablet, the following agreements have been withdrawn:
"Samsung DeX ended because another app is accessing your phone's screen."
"Samsung DeX ended because another app is accessing your tablet's screen."
"You can't use the SD card because it was inserted while a different user profile was in use."
An SD card was removed unsafely. To prevent your phone from restarting unexpectedly, save unsaved data and restart now.

Dole a buɗe katin SD da aka kulle kafin a yi amfani. Buɗewar zai ɗauki aƙalla awa guda ko fiye. Fara tare da baturi mai caji a kuma bar naúra a jone a kan wuta har sai an kamala buɗewa. Katse buɗewar ƙila ya haifar da rasa wasu ko duk bayanai
Kuskuren buɗe katin SD ya auku
"Some files on your SD card were encrypted on another device and can't be used on this phone."
Kuskuren ɓoye katin SD ya auku
A read/write error occurred on your SD card. If this continues, format your SD card or replace it.
"Your SD card isn't working correctly and has been set to read-only to prevent data loss. Backing up the data on your SD card is recommended."
SD card unmounted due to IT policy.
Turn off 5G to save battery when your phone has less than 15% battery remaining.
Bluetooth will stay on in Airplane mode.
To connect to a satellite, your network operator needs to be set to Select automatically.
Volume reduced to protect your hearing.
Secure Folder content will no longer be encrypted. Apps in Secure Folder will be able to run and send you notifications.
An karɓi dokokin ɓoyewa daga mai gudanarwa na nesa
Tap here to select a language and layout.
"To use face recognition, rotate your tablet so the camera isn't at the bottom"
Hold phone farther from your face
Hold tablet farther from your face
Face not recognized. Front camera may be dirty. Clean area above screen and try again.
Is your hand covering the sensor? Uncover it to use face recognition
Hold phone closer to your face
Hold tablet closer to your face
There was a problem with your face data. Register your face again.
"Can't use face recognition during video calls."
"Can't use face recognition because camera access is off"
"Biometric verification isn't available because of too many incorrect attempts."
"Biometric verification isn't available because of too many incorrect attempts."
"It's been a while since you verified your identity. You'll need to start again to register your face."
Too dark. Try turning on a light or going somewhere brighter.
If this keeps happening, restart your phone.
If this keeps happening, restart your tablet.
"Can't use face recognition while camera in use."
Wipe the fingerprint sensor and try again.
Make sure your finger is dry.
Move the tip of your S Pen away from the screen to scan your fingerprint.
"Don amfani da zanen yatsa, fara saita killaceccen nau'inkulle allo (zane, PIN, ko kalmar sirri)."
"Biometric verification isn't available because of too many incorrect attempts."
"Biometric verification isn't available because of too many incorrect attempts."
"Can't use fingerprint scanner in One-handed mode."
"Fingerprint sensor isn't responding. Try again later. If this continues, try restarting your phone."
The fingerprint data has been corrupted. Add your fingerprints again.
Disconnect from wireless charger to use your fingerprint
"Fingerprint recognition was improved in the latest software update. You won't be able to use fingerprint recognition until you remove your fingerprints and register them again."
This app can read when apps are pinned or unpinned.
Your screen has been brightened temporarily for better face recognition in the dark. You can turn this off in settings.
If your fingertip is dry, try moisturizing it.
"If you've added or changed your protective film, remove your fingerprints and add them again."
Ga wasu abubuwa da za ka iya gwadawa:
"If you're using a protective film, make sure it's compatible with the ultrasonic fingerprint sensor."
Having some trouble with the fingerprint sensor?
"Quick switch isn't supported in this situation."
You can set the Esc key to work as a Back button.
Turn on Touch sensitivity while using the Privacy Screen or Notepaper Screen for more accurate touch responsiveness.
An cire manhajar. Zaɓi wani abu daban.
%s an kashe. Zaɓi wani abun daban.
Old or damaged SIM cards can cause network connection problems. Contact your service provider or visit one of their stores to check whether it needs to be replaced.
Mobile Hotspot or Tethering is on
Mobile Hotspot or Tethering is on
This app installation file might not be safe. It might not be the app it claims to be. To protect your phone and personal data, install the app from an app store you trust instead.
This app installation file might not be safe. It might not be the app it claims to be. To protect your tablet and personal data, install the app from an app store you trust instead.
"This app isn't from an authorized app store. To protect your phone and personal information, install the app from an authorized store such as the Play Store or Galaxy Store."
"This app isn't from an authorized app store. To protect your tablet and personal information, install the app from an authorized store such as the Play Store or Galaxy Store."
"There seems to be something in your SIM card tray slot that doesn't belong there. Check it and try again."
Unplug the cable and plug it in again, or try a different cable.
"USB connection isn't stable. Unplug the cable and plug it in again, or try a different cable."
A USB storage device was removed unsafely. To prevent your phone from restarting unexpectedly, save unsaved data and restart now.
Some USB functions are unavailable in Emergency mode.
Unable to use functions related to connected USB device while Maximum power saving mode enabled.
Some USB functions will be limited while Maximum power saving mode is on.
Unable to use functions related to connected USB device while Reserve battery mode enabled.
Auto Blocker is on with maximum restrictions.
"Your phone's USB controller doesn't have enough resources to connect this device. Try disconnecting the device and connecting it again."
Your phone can only support up to 5 USB hub connections at the same time.
"Your phone can't provide enough power for this USB device. Connect the device to a self-powered USB hub before connecting it to your phone."
USB connection may increase battery usage.
Try unplugging the cable and plugging it in again.
Unlock your phone to use the connected USB device.
To use USB device, unlock your phone and reconnect the USB device.
"This USB device isn't supported by your phone."
Moisture has been detected in your charger/USB port. To remove the moisture, follow the tips below.
Shake your phone to remove moisture from the port.
It may take several hours for moisture in the port to dry.
You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) toward the port.

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean and the moisture is gone.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean and the moisture is gone.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port.
In the meantime, you can charge your phone wirelessly."
"There's moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port. Check before charging."
"Moisture has been detected in your charger/USB port. Make sure it's dry before charging your phone. It may take some time to dry completely."
"Your USB storage device isn't working correctly and has been set to read-only to prevent data loss. Backing up the data on your USB storage device is recommended."
To use this feature, you need to set Samsung Keyboard as the default.
"Couldn't connect to %s. Tap to manage this VPN."

Closing apps to cool down tablet

Your tablet is getting hot, so some apps have been closed to help it cool down.

"%s connection ended because another app is accessing your tablet's screen."
An kasa haɗawa da %s. A sake gwadawa.
Press and hold the Power button on the TV remote control until the TV restarts, or unplug the TV power cable and plug it in again.

Kun riga kun shiga wannan rukunin.
Allow the Auto Hotspot connection on your other device.

Mobile Hotspot turned off because you reached the data usage limit.

"You're connected to a 5 GHz Wi-Fi network. To use 6 GHz for Wi-Fi tethering, connect to a 6 GHz Wi-Fi network or turn off Wi-Fi."
Wi-Fi sign-in information shared with your device.
Your Wi-Fi connection is being shared.
%s is using mobile data because your WLAN connection is slow or unstable.
"Couldn't find nearby device to connect to."
On your other device, allow the connection request from this tablet.
"If you don't see the connection request, go to Bluetooth settings on the other device and connect it to this tablet."
To use wireless keyboard sharing, go to Bluetooth settings on your phone or tablet and connect to this tablet.
Keyboard input will be sent to %s.
This will allow you to access work apps, notifications, data, and other work profile features.
"Auto Blocker is on with maximum restrictions. To protect your security, work profiles can't be created."
